DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness investigational glaucoma therapy patient open-angle glaucoma ocular hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Glaucoma Therapy Treat Open-Angle Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: 18 year old . Diagnosis openangle glaucoma ( without pseudoexfoliation pigment dispersion component ) ocular hypertension . Mean intraocular pressure ( IOP ) least one eye great 21 mmHg less equal 36 mmHg screen visit . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Pregnant History chronic recurrent severe inflammatory eye disease . History ocular infection ocular inflammation within past three month either eye . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
